services.subtitle: Specialized solutions for exceptional cargo transport and lifting
services.description: Industrial cranes 25-1600 tons with nationwide coverage. Over 30 years serving Maracaibo, Barcelona, Valencia, Puerto La Cruz, Ciudad Guayana, Orinoco Belt and all Venezuelan territory with the most advanced technology.
services.service1Desc: Mobile hydraulic cranes 25-500 ton and crawler cranes 300-1600 ton for oil, petrochemical, steel and energy sectors throughout Venezuela.
services.service2Desc: Hydraulic super lowboy up to 250 tons for transformers, turbines and industrial equipment. Coverage in Maracaibo, Valencia, Barcelona, Ciudad Guayana.
services.service3Desc: Rigging and lift engineering for complex projects in refineries, petrochemical plants, steel mills and ports.
services.service4Desc: Advanced 3D modeling for PDVSA, Petromonagas, SIDOR projects and energy sector. Route and procedure optimization.
services.ctaDesc: Contact us 24 hours a day, 7 days a week for immediate attention

about.title: About Us
about.missionContent: Our purpose is to provide comprehensive services for lifting, mobilization and land transport of heavy and extra-heavy loads, a wide variety of updated and high-capacity cranes, mobile telescopic and crawler cranes from 25 tons to 1600 tons from German brands Grove, Liebherr and Manitowoc, and hydraulic super lowboys for handling exceptional loads such as electric generators, metro and railway cars, turbines and oil and industrial generators. By meeting criteria of safety, guarantee, reliability, responsibility and quality, in order to anticipate and respond effectively to the needs and requirements of our clients, relying on highly qualified personnel capable of achieving the highest performance in effective and fast solutions in all our services.
about.visionContent: To be a service company recognized, nationally and internationally, for its excellence in providing comprehensive lifting, mobilization and land transport services of heavy and extra-heavy loads in Venezuela, continuously improving effectiveness, thus developing the capacity to respond and achieve satisfaction of our clients' needs.
about.visionItem1: Provide Services with Safety and Quality under the highest standards
about.visionItem2: The client is and will always be the center of our attention
about.visionItem3: Our clients' business is our business
about.philosophyItem1: Give our clients the reliability to deliver
about.philosophyItem2: Be accurate and objective in all services provided
about.philosophyItem3: Contribute to the growth and development of Venezuela
about.philosophyItem5: You are an integral part of "EQUISER, C.A."
about.valuesItem2: Safety and Quality in our works and services
about.valuesItem3: Efficiency and Responsibility in our productive and administrative processes
about.valuesItem4: The Safety of our personnel and entrusted facilities
about.commitmentText: At EQUISER CRANES C.A., each project is an opportunity to demonstrate our excellence and commitment to safety. With over 30 years of experience, we continue to be the leading company in lifting and heavy transport services in Venezuela, always focused on exceeding our clients' expectations.
